name: PING 1.5+™
description: PING 1.5+™ is a new arcade style puzzle game with the objective of shooting the cube through over 100 stages to reach the orange.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Very fun retro Pong/Breakout-style game. Highly recommended :)
